description: Non-material amendment application to planning consent ref: P2013/3202/FUL. Amendments include alterations to the ground floor shopfront windows fronting Wharfdale Road and door/louvres to cycle store and substation fronting Crinan Street.
decision_conditions:
For the avoidance of doubt, Condition 2 of Planning Permission P2014/0609/FUL should now read:

CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 

3326/P1, 3326/P2, 3326/P3, 3326/P4 Rev A, 3326/P5 rev A, 3326/P6 Rev F, 3326/P7 Rev C, 3326/P8 Rev C, 3326/P9 Rev C, 3326/P10 Rev C, 3326/P11 Rev D, 3326/P12 Rev C, 3326/P13 Rev C, 3326/P14 Rev D, 3326-P15 Rev F, 3326-P16 Rev F, 3326/P17 Rev C, 3326/P18 Rev B, 3326/P19 Rev C, 3326/P20 Rev B, 3326/P21 Rev B, 3326/P22 Rev B, 3326/P23 Rev B, 3326/P24 Rev B, 3326/P25 Rev B, 3326/P26 Rev B, 3326/P27 Rev C, 3326/P28 Rev B, 3326/P29 , 3326/P30 Rev A, 3326/P31 Rev A, 3326/P32 Rev A,

Documents (all dated August 2013): Energy Assessment, Statement of Community Involvement, Ventilation Strategy Report, Foul Water & Utilities Assessment, Flood Risk Assessment, Biodiversity Assessment Report, Historic Environment Assessment, Air Quality Statement, BREEAM Pre-Certification Framework Report, Sustainable Design & Construction Statement, Daylight & Sunlight Report, Delivery & Servicing Plan, Travel Plan, Design & Access Statement, Planning Statement, Site Waste Management Plan, External Noise Assessment, Transport Assessment, Site Investigation Report, Archaeology Desk Based Report and Tree Survey.
	
REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
